name: Bridg Payment Solutions Ltd.
description: Developer of a payment application designed to make payments without any data plans. The company's application facilitates a transaction to occur between multiple devices even if the phones have a connection to the internet utilizing Bluetooth technology, enabling users to make easy, safe, and wireless payments that have a larger reach with complete user control.
